Seven,

Since I did buy and enjoy this game,  I appreciate you posting the 
wallpaper (which is even now adorning one of my desktops). I have a 
question on the screen saver, though, as I don't have ready access to a 
Mac. Is it a slideshow-type screensaver, or something more complex? If 
it is a slideshow, are the pictures actual captures of the game screens, 
or promo artwork like the wallpaper you posted?

    Thanks,
    Chuck
